RESUME.// ABOUT: Software Engineer with {{yearsExperience}} years experience designing and delivering scalable, cross-platform web applications. Specialises in writing clean, maintainable code across the stack, with a strong emphasis on performance, usability, and scalability. Eager to contribute to teams that value technical excellence and building great products together.
RESUME.ABOUT_: Full-stack engineer with extensive experience leading large-scale modernisation projects, building scalable TypeScript/React applications, and driving cross-team technical delivery. Adept at architecting complex systems, mentoring teams, and translating business requirements into high-quality software.
RESUME.ABOUT: Full-stack engineer with {{yearsExperience}}+ years of experience leading large-scale modernisation projects and building production TypeScript/React applications. Architected complex systems, mentored engineering teams, and delivered measurable business impact through technical excellence. Specialises in legacy system modernisation, technical leadership, and scalable front-end architecture.

PAGE_HOME.HERO_TEXT: I help teams ship <1>reliable, <2/>scalable</1> front-end systems.
PAGE_HOME.HERO_SUBTEXT: 15+ years experience leading React & TypeScript delivery — focused <2/>on quality, maintainability, and impact.
PAGE_HOME.VALUE_1_DESCRIPTION: Deep expertise in TypeScript, React, and Node.js with focus on clean, scalable code.
PAGE_HOME.VALUE_2_DESCRIPTION: Ship features quickly without sacrificing quality. Security and performance minded.
PAGE_HOME.VALUE_3_DESCRIPTION: Lead front-end teams, mentor developers, and foster collaborative engineering cultures.
PAGE_HOME.VALUE_4_DESCRIPTION: Tackle complex challenges from legacy modernisation to greenfield projects ensuring continuous delivery.

PAGE_ABOUT.P2: I'm Cornelius, a Full-Stack Software Engineer with over {{yearsExperience}} years experience building scalable, cross-platform web applications. I specialise in <1>TypeScript</1>, <1>React</1>, <1>Node.js</1> and <1>Go</1>. I have a passion for reducing complexity, automating repetitive tasks and building engaging user interfaces.
PAGE_ABOUT.P3: I started my dev journey back in <1/> (before border-radius!) in Cape Town, South Africa. Since then, I've worked in various roles including as a Full-Stack Developer, Team Lead, Scrum Master and Front-end Tech Lead. My experience spans across different industries, in particular e-commerce, healthcare, logistics and lately finance.
PAGE_ABOUT.P4: Since <1/> I've been working remotely as an independent contractor.
PAGE_ABOUT.KYCO_LINK: PS: I'm fluent in English, German and Afrikaans and occasionally blog at <1/>.
PAGE_ABOUT.CONTACT: If you'd like to connect or chat, feel free to <1>contact me</1>.
PAGE_ABOUT.TIMELINE_AGENCY: Worked for an e-commerce focused startup and a web development agency
PAGE_ABOUT.TIMELINE_CONSULTANT_1: Worked as independent contractor for clients across South Africa
PAGE_ABOUT.TIMELINE_CONSULTANT_2: Working as independent contractor for clients across Europe, UK and South Africa
PAGE_ABOUT.PRINCIPLE_1: First make it work, then make it better.
PAGE_ABOUT.PRINCIPLE_2: Always leave code cleaner than you found it.
PAGE_ABOUT.PRINCIPLE_3: Nothing is as permanent as a temporary solution.

PAGE_CONTACT.GET_IN_TOUCH: I'm currently available for freelance projects, part-time and full-time employment. Feel free to reach out.

PAGE_PROJECTS.BLURB: Below you'll find a list of some of the things I've built, and which I work on from time to time:

EDUCATION.DID_NOT_COMPLETE: did not complete (feel free to ask me why)

SELF_TAUGHT.TITLE: Self-taught Software Engineer
SELF_TAUGHT.DESCRIPTION:
I first got into HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP at an engineering startup in 2010. Their website was built using HTML tables and I had the pleasure of upgrading the site to semantic HTML5 and CSS3. Talk about modernisation... JavaScript was used only sparingly with inline scripts to add additional functionality here and there.

From there I went on to dev house / web dev agency, where I had excellent mentors who introduced me to data modelling and core web development concepts. Since then I've been on a continuous journey of learning and staying on top of the game, especially in the JavaScript and PWA ecosystem.

LEADERSHIP_TRAINING.TITLE: Leadership Development Training
LEADERSHIP_TRAINING.DESCRIPTION: Completed a six-month leadership coaching programme focused on team dynamics, relational and emotional intelligence, self-leadership, and navigating complexity in group settings. The training emphasised goal-setting, the development of healthy communication patterns, the cultivation of psychological safety, and the establishment of effective team habits and routines. Key outcomes included enhanced conflict resolution skills, increased role clarity, and stronger collaboration within diverse team environments.

MODERATION_WORKSHOP.TITLE: Public Speaking and Moderation Workshop
MODERATION_WORKSHOP.DESCRIPTION: The workshop focused on developing confident and persuasive communication skills, including effective use of language and rhetoric to engage audiences. Participants learned strategies for preparing and delivering public speaking events, fostering creativity, and applying practical tips to enhance overall presentation effectiveness.

LEADERSHIP_SEMINAR.TITLE: Mentoring and Leadership Seminar - Conflict Management
LEADERSHIP_SEMINAR.DESCRIPTION: The seminar focused on developmental psychology and conflict management within leadership and mentoring contexts. It emphasised understanding behavioural dynamics and age-specific needs when mentoring children and adolescents, as well as techniques for effective communication and conflict resolution in team settings.

PRESCHOOL.TITLE: Preschool & Kindergarten Teacher
PRESCHOOL.DESCRIPTION: Supported weekly educational and care activities for children aged 3 to 6 at a German kindergarten. Assisted lead teachers in creating a positive, play-based learning environment and promoted social development through interactive group activities. Additionally, conducted sport classes to encourage physical development, coordination, and teamwork.

TREASURER.TITLE: Treasurer
TREASURER.DESCRIPTION: Oversaw financial planning and budgeting for a small church. Collaborated with the church council to set budgets, approve spending, and make strategic financial decisions. Responsible for monthly financial reporting to the church council and biannual presentations to the full congregation. Created charts and statistics to visualise financial health and support transparent decision-making.

WORSHIP_LEADER.TITLE: Worship Leader
WORSHIP_LEADER.DESCRIPTION: Led a small worship team of 4 musicians and vocalists in a church setting. Responsible for selecting music, coordinating rehearsals, and facilitating live worship twice a month. Fostered a collaborative and spiritually focused environment within the team and supported the congregation through music.

YOUTH_LEADER.TITLE: Youth Leader
YOUTH_LEADER.DESCRIPTION: Organised weekly youth events focused on community, personal growth, and faith development. Planned and facilitated Kids Days and co-organised youth camps in collaboration with the youth pastor. Helped create a safe, engaging space for young people to connect and grow.

STUDENT_REPRESENTATIVE.TITLE: Student Representative
STUDENT_REPRESENTATIVE.DESCRIPTION: Served as a liaison between students and teachers during my final school year. Helped organise student events and represented student interests in school matters. Took primary responsibility for advertising, including designing posters and promotional materials for school-wide activities.

FE_TECH_LEAD.TITLE: Front-end Tech Lead
FE_TECH_LEAD.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Led front-end architecture, tech strategy, and team development for a cross-functional engineering team.
FE_TECH_LEAD.DESCRIPTION: Owned all front-end technology decisions for a cross-functional development team of around 20 engineers. Collaborated with the CTO on hiring (interviewing and selection), authored technical documentation, and drove architectural direction. Led and mentored a team of 8 front-end developers while coordinating closely with mid-tier and backend teams.

PROBLEM_SOLVER.TITLE: Problem Solver
PROBLEM_SOLVER.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Delivered creative engineering solutions to complex business requirements, within tight deadlines.
PROBLEM_SOLVER.DESCRIPTION: Applied innovative thinking and technical expertise to address complex engineering challenges driven by demanding business requirements. Designed and delivered robust, high-quality solutions within tight technical and time constraints.

SCRUM_MASTER.TITLE: Scrum Master
SCRUM_MASTER.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Facilitated Agile practices for a globally distributed team across the US, UK, Australia, and South Africa.
SCRUM_MASTER.DESCRIPTION: Led Agile ceremonies — including stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, and refinements — for a distributed development team of around 35 people across multiple time zones. Worked closely with product owners to align delivery with business goals, fostering a high-performing environment with minimal process friction.

MENTOR.TITLE: Mentor
MENTOR.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Provided day-to-day leadership and mentorship for a small dev team (4 members) early in my career.
MENTOR.DESCRIPTION: Introduced efficient development workflows and was responsible for task distribution, peer development, and performance reviews. Actively mentored junior devs through hands-on coaching and regular feedback to support their growth and confidence.

HEKK_STUDIO.TITLE: Front-end Specialist & Full-Stack Engineer
HEKK_STUDIO.DESCRIPTION: Worked as Front-end Specialist developing user-facing features for a booking platform.

INVOICE_ASSISTANT.TITLE: Founder
INVOICE_ASSISTANT.DESCRIPTION: Conceptualised and developed Invoice Assistant, a fully encrypted Progressive Web App (PWA) enabling freelancers to create, send, and track invoices, ensuring timely payments.

REGAL_DIGITAL.TITLE: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
REGAL_DIGITAL.DESCRIPTION: Building SaaS products and web solutions with a modern cross-platform tech stack in the JavaScript ecosystem. Consulting and advising on tech strategy.
REGAL_DIGITAL.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_1: Building TypeScript + React SaaS platforms, with a focus on domain-driven design, security and maintainability
REGAL_DIGITAL.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_2: Consulting on tech strategy and architecture, driving continuous feature delivery and future-proofing systems
REGAL_DIGITAL.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_3: Modernising client workflows with AI-driven solutions, automating processes and improving operational efficiency

HOLMLAB.TITLE: Full-Stack Consultant Engineer
HOLMLAB.DESCRIPTION: Developed internal software solutions for a pathology lab, focusing on process management, report generation, and archiving. Worked with medical data standards such as FHIR and HL7 to ensure compliance and interoperability within healthcare systems.

CHEP.TITLE: $t(LEADERSHIP.FE_TECH_LEAD.TITLE) & Senior Consultant
CHEP.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Drove TypeScript adoption and migration of a legacy codebase to React. Led a team of 8 front-end developers in a cross-functional, international engineering team.
CHEP.DESCRIPTION: Initially worked as a Front-end Developer and later as Tech Lead. Responsible for maintaining a legacy Backbone.js application and leading its migration to TypeScript & React. Collaborating closely with mid-tier, business layer, SAP and BW teams to continiously deliver features while migrating to a modern codebase.
CHEP.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_1: Led the front-end modernisation of CHEP's global logistics platform (25 languages, 65 countries, 55K+ enterprise customers), migrating a 650K-SLOC Backbone.js front-end to TypeScript + React
CHEP.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_2: Served as Front-end Tech Lead, defining architecture patterns, driving migration strategy, and implementing core features as the team's lead React/TypeScript engineer
CHEP.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_3: Championed WebdriverIO for E2E testing, covering 100% of business rules (~9,000 scenarios)
CHEP.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_4: Raised unit test coverage from 2% to ~35%, improving stability and reducing regression
CHEP.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_5: Designed and built a rules-based validation engine supporting 5,000+ business rules

FLAMELINK.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_3: Provided technical support to customers, resolving issues within 24 hours

RESPONSIVE.DESCRIPTION_ITEM_3: Ensured code quality via testing, documentation, and best practices

LANGUAGES.PROFICIENCY_NATIVE_DESCRIPTION: I grew up in South Africa where English is one of the 12 official languages. And because my parents are native Germans, both English and German are native to me. However, because I spent most of my life in South Africa I prefer to speak English.
LANGUAGES.PROFICIENCY_CONVERSATIONAL_DESCRIPTION: Similar to English, Afrikaans is also one of the 12 official languages in South Africa. I learnt Afrikaans at school and to this day still regularly speak Afrikaans with friends and work colleagues.
